definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Every day, 30 lorries and containers will be made overseas Anping wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 每天有30輛貨車及集裝箱將安平絲網發往外地。

sentences.english: Our factory features exquisite screen printing and high quality gold-plating.
sentences.chinese: 我廠具有優質旳絲網印刷與高質量旳鍍金技術。

sentences.english: Photorealistic and sparkly screen-printed graphics at front.
sentences.chinese: 閃閃發光的真實感和絲網印刷在前面的圖形。

sentences.english: The walls are partly destroyed, however, the forge grids remain.
sentences.chinese: 牆體已有部分毀壞，然而，窗戶的鐵絲網還在。

sentences.english: Additionally, the screen mesh has little impact on the system frequency.
sentences.chinese: 絲網目數對系統頻率的影響很小。

sentences.english: They live inside the wire, in the middle of nowhere, separated from the civilian population.
sentences.chinese: 他們生活在鐵絲網內，無處可藏，與平民百姓隔離。

sentences.english: He has taught the silkscreen method to many other artists.
sentences.chinese: 他還把絲網印刷工藝教授給其他很多藝術家。

sentences.english: We put a fine wirework mesh over the chimney so that birds can't get in.
sentences.chinese: 我們在煙囪上蓋了金屬絲網，這樣鳥兒就進不去了。

sentences.english: The results showed the latter two were better in performance.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，鋼絲網和鋼纖維的增強作用較優。

sentences.english: Astronomers suspected that the low-density gas permeates the filaments of the web.
sentences.chinese: 天文學家懷疑低密度氣體充斥在這個絲網之中。

sentences.english: Are screen print materials inventoried and issued by order?
sentences.chinese: 絲網印的材料是按定單存放的嗎？

sentences.english: Insects,the main diet of most spiders,usually are captured in silken webs.
sentences.chinese: 昆蟲是蜘蛛的主要食物，通常用絲網捕蟲。

sentences.english: All I could see around was just a wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 四周我能看到的只有鋼絲網。

sentences.english: Hoarfrost on a wire fence in the US state of Iowa.
sentences.chinese: 美國愛荷華州鐵絲網上的白霜。

sentences.english: Giant loops of barbed wire lie rusting in the surf.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的一圈圈的帶刺鐵絲網在海浪中生鏽。

sentences.english: Prior to this, Kitagawa has been the county seat around the barbed wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，一直是北川縣城周圍的鐵絲網。

definition: to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 亞克力|亚克力[ya4 ke4 li4]
case for an ink stone or ink slab
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
